meanings.definition: The most respected or prominent person in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: In the world of music, the doyen of classical composers is Beethoven.
meanings.sent2: She is the doyen of the fashion industry, with decades of experience and influence.
meanings.sent3: The doyen of the art world always wears a colorful hat to gallery openings.
meanings.sent4: As the doyen of the culinary scene, Chef Smith's restaurant is always fully booked.
meanings.sent5: Everyone looks up to the doyen of literature for guidance and inspiration.

meanings.definition: A person who is considered the most skilled or knowledgeable in a particular group.
meanings.sent1: Among the young musicians, Sarah is the doyen of the violin players.
meanings.sent2: He quickly became the doyen of the coding team due to his problem-solving skills.
meanings.sent3: The doyen of the book club always knows the best novels to recommend.
meanings.sent4: She is the doyen of the hiking group, leading the way on every trail.
meanings.sent5: As the doyen of the chess club, he has never lost a match against his peers.

meanings.definition: The oldest or most experienced member of a group.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa is the doyen of our family, sharing stories from his youth.
meanings.sent2: The doyen of the team has been playing soccer since he was a child.
meanings.sent3: The doyen of the knitting club can create intricate patterns with ease.
meanings.sent4: She is the doyen of the gardening club, teaching us all about plant care.
meanings.sent5: The doyen of the hiking group knows all the trails like the back of his hand.
